item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

02/14/2011's location will be:
Richter's

Richter's is a New Haven icon, with history dating back to 1911. If you've never been there, its a cozy, warm establishment with a beautifully detailed wood bar. (Ok, I didn't quite explain that right - look at the picture. It's lovely.)

Here's their beer description from their website: "Here at Richters we have 13 beers on draft and 25 beers available in a bottle. Our draft beer in available in three sizes: a half pint, a pint and of course our signature half yard. Yep, 32ounces of beer in an 18 inch glass. Our bottled beer is available in ... well, a bottle."

Specials:
Speaking of their half yards, Monday's they have $5 half yards

The owner, Dieter was also kind enough to give us $4 house drinks. (I explained that while the half yards are both a great deal and look cool, people like me who aren't exactly.. coordinated enough to drink out of a glass that's 18" tall need a special too!)

They always have $2 PBRs and Miller Lights : )

BUY TWO APPS GET ONE FREE!

Please RSVP for this event as soon as you know so that I can give them an accurate heads up.

For Happy Hour Events if you're only a "Maybe" please put this in your comment.

Hope to see you all there!

Your host is Devorah, # in RSVP. Richters has a very narrow bar area, we will probably be in the dining room. Give me a ring if you don't see us when you arrive! The bartender will also know where we are.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: February 14 Happy Hour at Richter's!
